description: Phased Playbook: Migrate system from MMA-only to ModelManagerSuite-only

todos.text:
PHASE 0 – SAFETY BACKUP

0.1 Create a clean git branch
`git checkout -b migrate-to-mms`

0.2 Tag the current working state
`git tag pre-mms-migration`

0.3 Export Docker volumes that hold model files, logs, and SQLite DBs if any
`docker volume ls | grep model | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -I{} docker run --rm -v {}:/vol -v $PWD/backup:/backup alpine tar czf /backup/{}.tgz -C /vol .`

──────────────────────────────────
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Huwag magpatuloy sa Phase 1 hangga't hindi nakukumpleto at nave-verify ang lahat ng safety backups. Ito ang iyong pinakaligtas na fallback kung magkaroon ng kritikal na problema.

PHASE 1 – RESTORE STABILITY

1.1 Ensure the original ModelManagerAgent container is present in language_stack compose: `docker/language_stack/docker-compose.yml`
- service name: model_manager_agent
- command: ["python", "-m", "main_pc_code.agents.model_manager_agent"]
- ports:
  - "5570:5570"
  - "6570:6570"

1.2 Re-deploy to make sure all dependent agents are green again
`cd docker/language_stack`
`docker compose up -d --build`
`./scripts/check_system_health.py` # verify MMA answers health_check on :6570

──────────────────────────────────
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Siguraduhing ang buong sistema ay stable at lahat ng dependent agents ay 'green' bago magpatuloy. Ang pagpapakilala ng bagong component sa isang unstable na environment ay magdudulot ng mas maraming problema.

PHASE 2 – VALIDATE MODEL MANAGER SUITE (MMS)

2.1 Add temporary compose service `model_manager_suite_test` (no port conflict) in `docker/language_stack/docker-compose.override.yml`.

2.2 Launch & smoke-test
`docker compose -f ... up -d model_manager_suite_test`
`python3 utils/mms_smoke_test.py`

2.3 Functional diff vs MMA
- Write a pytest that fires identical JSON RPC calls to MMA (tcp://localhost:5570) and MMS (tcp://localhost:7721).
- Compare results for success status and key presence.

2.4 Identify and fix any "status": "error" or "…not implemented…" from MMS by porting logic from `model_manager_agent.py` to `model_manager_suite.py`.

──────────────────────────────────
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ito ang pinakamahalagang validation step. Huwag magpatuloy sa Phase 3 hangga't hindi pumapasa ang lahat ng parity tests (≥ 99%). Ang anumang 'error' o 'not implemented' na isyu ay dapat munang ayusin.

PHASE 3 – PREPARE DROP-IN REPLACEMENT

3.1 Expose MMS on LEGACY PORTS while still in test container.

3.2 Add module alias in `model_manager_suite.py` to maintain import paths:
`import sys as _sys`
`_sys.modules['main_pc_code.agents.model_manager_agent'] = _sys.modules[__name__]`

3.3 Run `grep -R "ModelManagerAgent(" *` to ensure no direct class instantiation.

3.4 Verify all clients read `MODEL_MANAGER_PORT` from environment variables.

──────────────────────────────────
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Bago isagawa ang aktwal na cut-over, siguraduhing lahat ng paghahanda sa phase na ito ay tapos na. I-verify na ang MMS ay gumagana sa legacy ports at lahat ng code-level dependencies ay naayos na para maiwasan ang 'downtime' sa susunod na phase.

PHASE 4 – CUT-OVER

4.1 In `docker-compose.yml`, replace the `model_manager_agent` service with the `model_manager_suite` service, pointing to ports 5570/6570.

4.2 Remove or comment out the old `model_manager_agent` service stanza.

4.3 Re-deploy:
`docker compose up -d --build model_manager_suite`
`docker compose rm -f model_manager_agent`

4.4 Health validation:
- `curl -s tcp://localhost:6570`
- Run pytest from 2.3 pointing only to 5570.
- Run end-to-end voice command test.

──────────────────────────────────
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Pagkatapos ng cut-over, magsagawa ng masusing health validation. Huwag magpatuloy sa clean-up (Phase 5) hangga't hindi 100% kumpirmado na ang sistema ay fully operational gamit ang ModelManagerSuite.

PHASE 5 – CLEAN-UP & OBSERVABILITY

5.1 Update monitoring & dashboards to track `ModelManagerSuite` health port 6570.

5.2 Remove old MMA image to avoid accidental roll-back.

5.3 Merge branch to main, push tags, and create PR:
`git add .`
`git commit -m "Replace ModelManagerAgent with consolidated ModelManagerSuite"`
`git push origin migrate-to-mms`

──────────────────────────────────
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ang clean-up ay ang huling hakbang para gawing permanente ang pagbabago. Siguraduhing na-update na ang monitoring at na-merge na ang code bago ituring na 'tapos' ang buong migration.

PHASE 6 – ROLLBACK PLAN (Reference Only)

- `git checkout pre-mms-migration`
- Re-enable original `docker-compose` service `model_manager_agent`, redeploy.
- No database migrations were performed, so state remains intact.

──────────────────────────────────
NOTE: Ito ay hindi isang step na kailangang gawin, kundi isang reference plan. Gamitin lamang ito kung magkaroon ng malubhang isyu sa alinmang phase (lalo na sa Phase 4) na hindi kayang ayusin kaagad.

CHECKLIST SUMMARY (For Final Review)

☐ MMA running & healthy before change
☐ MMS parity tests pass on test port
☐ Missing helpers ported, no stub errors
☐ Module-alias line added
☐ docker-compose updated → MMS @5570
☐ All clients operate unchanged
☐ Observability dashboards updated
☐ Backups & rollback tag created

──────────────────────────────────
NOTE: Gamitin ang checklist na ito bilang mabilisang buod para masigurado na walang nakalimutang hakbang sa bawat yugto ng proseso.
